name: Xojo Binary Toolbar File
summary: Learn about .XOJO_BINARY_TOOLBAR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Xojo toolbars can be saved in three different formats depending on the selected project format. The formats include: Project (text), Binary, and XML. You do not need to have a product license in order to create the XOJO_BINARY_TOOLBAR file.

To create the XOJO_BINARY_TOOLBAR file, select Insert → Toolbar, and then name the toolbar. After you create the toolbar, select it from the left panel, then select File → Export [toolbar name]..., choose the save location, and click Save.
To import a XOJO_BINARY_TOOLBAR, select File → Import..., navigate to the file, and click Import.
NOTE: REAL Software Real Studio became Xojo, Inc. Xojo in 2013.

description: File created by Xojo, an IDE that allows users to develop cross-platform applications; contains toolbar data in binary format, such as represented interfaces and declared methods.
